TITLE: Schumer threatens imminent vote on Senate rules change
SUMMARY: The majority leader said they would debate changes to the chamber's rules unless Republicans allowed a vote on elections reform.

TITLE: 'It's only gotten worse': The long shadow of the night that broke the House
SUMMARY: For most Democrats, the biggest affront wasn't even the violence by Donald Trump's supporters. It was the votes more than 140 of their GOP colleagues took afterward.

TITLE: Could Jan. 6 happen again?
SUMMARY: The Capitol Police has made progress under a new chief. But many on the Hill don't have an easy answer.

TITLE: Harry Reid to lie in state in Capitol Rotunda
SUMMARY: The former Senate majority leader died last Tuesday.

TITLE: Twitter bans personal Greene account for Covid misinformation
SUMMARY: “Twitter is an enemy to America and can’t handle the truth,” Marjorie Taylor Greene said.

TITLE: Members of Congress interacted with Jan. 6 rioters, Rep. Thompson says
SUMMARY: But it’s not clear how extensive or significant those interactions were.

TITLE: Liz Cheney on Trump: He’s a threat to American democracy
SUMMARY: “He crossed lines no American president has ever crossed before,” she said.

TITLE: Capitol Police chief says force remains short-staffed
SUMMARY: “We’re now really about 400 officers short of where we need to be,” J. Thomas Manger said.

TITLE: Efforts to Trump-proof presidential certification crash into congressional realities
SUMMARY: As lawmakers weigh how to safeguard the certification of elections from a future Jan. 6 attack, they’re facing one huge constitutional roadblock.

TITLE: MTG hit with Facebook suspension after Twitter ban
SUMMARY: “Facebook has joined Twitter in censoring me,” Greene (R-Ga.) wrote on Gettr, a social media platform favored by some right-wing conservatives.

TITLE: Capitol Police union douses private security proposal
SUMMARY: “We need to hire more officers — period. The last thing we need are private security contractors who are not trained to our standards,” the chair of the union said in a statement sent to POLITICO.

TITLE: Schumer tries to jump-start Dems with rules change threat
SUMMARY: The majority leader said they would debate changes to the Senate's rules unless Republicans allow a vote on elections reform.

TITLE: ‘It’s only gotten worse’: The long shadow of the night that broke the House
SUMMARY: For most Democrats, the biggest affront wasn’t even the violence by Donald Trump’s supporters. It was the votes more than 140 of their GOP colleagues took afterward.

TITLE: 'I don't think that's a good idea': GOP shudders at Trump Jan. 6 speech
SUMMARY: Republican Sen. Pat Toomey said the event isn’t a “terribly good idea,” but added, “What am I going to do about it?”

TITLE: Manchin on Biden's spending bill: 'No negotiation going on'
Manchin on Biden's spending bill: 'No negotiation going on'
SUMMARY: The West Virginia senator thinks Democrats would be better off focusing on climate provisions in their wide-ranging megabill.

TITLE: Gallego: Garland 'extremely weak' on Jan. 6 cases
SUMMARY: The Arizona Democrat also directed his ire at GOP lawmakers who he accused of trying to shield Jan. 6 rioters.

TITLE: Bobby Rush to relinquish 30-year hold on House seat
SUMMARY: The veteran Illinois congressman and former Black Panther leader said, “I’m not retiring … I’m just entering into a new level of my life.”
